modelingAssessmentEditor.conflictingAssessmentTitle: 1st out of {{count}} conflicting assessments. Assessed by

messages.lock: You now have the lock on this submission. Only you can assess this model. Please assess this model before opening other submissions.
messages.noModel: This submission does not contain a model.
messages.submitFailedWithConflict: Submission failed! Conflict with existing Assessments detected
messages.resultDismissed: Your assessment was dismissed because another tutor already rated this model.
messages.confirmSubmission: You have not assessed all model elements. Are you sure you want to submit this assessment? You will not be able to change it afterwards.
messages.confirmCancel: Are you sure you want to cancel the assessment? Your current assessment progress will be deleted and the submission will be available for assessment to other tutors again.
messages.feedbackTextTooLong: Failed to save assessment. Feedback text must be no longer than 500 characters.

modelingAssessmentEditor.automaticAssessmentAvailable: Congratulations! To save you some time, parts of this model were already assessed automatically. Please review the automatic assessment and assess the rest of the model afterwards. By submitting the assessment you also confirm the automatic assessment. Please be aware that you are responsible for the whole assessment.
